meanings.definition: A type of small, thin sausage.
meanings.sent1: I grilled some chipolatas for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The chipolatas were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent3: The chipolatas danced in the pan as they sizzled.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of chipolatas filled the kitchen like a savory cloud.
meanings.sent5: The chipolatas were like flavorful little gems on the plate.

meanings.sent1: My mom's special pasta includes chipolatas.
meanings.sent2: The casserole was packed with delicious chipolatas.
meanings.sent3: The chipolatas in the stew were the stars of the meal.
meanings.sent4: The chipolatas added a burst of flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent5: The chipolatas were the highlight of the dinner party.
